message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

This paper is about evaluating image descriptions, which involves both computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) and cs.CL (Computation and Language) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also proposes a new automated metric, which falls under the category of machine learning and could be classified as cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper discusses state-of-the-art image description approaches, which could be categorized as cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
